title: AI Specialist
job_overview:
We’re looking for someone with knowledge or experience in creating short AI-generated video clips (around 30 seconds). The content will be SFW motivational videos. Image to Video with lip synching and hand gestures.

If you know what to do and how to get it done efficiently—especially using AI tools—then we want to hear from you!

To apply: Send samples or a quick message showing your experience.
